Uses of Interface
cn.spark2fire.jscrapy.selector.Selector

  • Packages that use Selector 
    Package Description
    cn.spark2fire.jscrapy.selector
    Selectors for page extraction.

    • Uses of Selector in cn.spark2fire.jscrapy.selector

      Classes in cn.spark2fire.jscrapy.selector that implement Selector 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AndSelector
      All selectors will be arranged as a pipeline.
      class  BaseElementSelector 
      class  CssSelector
      CSS selector.
      class  JsonPathSelector
      JsonPath selector.
      Used to extract content from JSON.
      class  LinksSelector
      Links selector based on jsoup.
      class  OrSelector
      All extractors will do extracting separately,
      and the results of extractors will combined as the final result.
      class  RegexSelector
      Selector in regex.
      class  ReplaceSelector
      Replace selector.
      class  SmartContentSelector
      Borrowed from https://code.google.com/p/cx-extractor/
      class  XpathSelector
      XPath selector based on Xsoup.
